Hello There, ðŸ‘‹, I am Geetesh Laddha pursuing BCA from Maharaja College, University of Rajasthan. Currently I am in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

I am an enthusiastic programmer. I have worked on JavaScript, HTML, CSS. I have also worked on some JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS and NextJS, some backend technologies NodeJS and Django(Python), and some css frameworks like Bootstrap and MaterializeCss. I also work on some tools and technologies like JSON, SASS. I have also earned 3 gold badges in Problem Solving, 10 days of JS and Python, and 3 silver badges in C++, 30 days of code, SQL on HackerRank.

Apart from this, I love to explore food and new places. I love to play PlayStation and I play cricket as well. I am very interactive and enthusiastic in person.

If you fancy a chat feel free to drop me a line.

Have a good day!!
